alert.note: Alert for Carlisle; Graves; Hickman (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 19 at 12:44PM EDT until July 19 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Carlisle County in western Kentucky... Central Graves County in western Kentucky... Northeastern Hickman County in western Kentucky... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 1144 AM CDT, emergency management reported flash flooding across the warned area. Many roads remain impassable. Some homes and businesses are still impacted. Water levels are slowly receding overall. But some rain continues across the area. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Heavy rain producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Mayfield, Bardwell, Fulgham, Sedalia, Wingo, Arlington, Fancy Farm and Lowes. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
